waterComplaint.title: Water Supply Issue
waterComplaint.description: There is no water supply in our area since yesterday morning. This is affecting daily activities.

electricityComplaint.title: Power Outage
electricityComplaint.description: Frequent power cuts in the locality. Power goes off for 2-3 hours daily.

wasteComplaint.title: Garbage Not Collected
wasteComplaint.description: Garbage has not been collected for the past 3 days. It's creating hygiene issues.

roadComplaint.title: Road Damage
roadComplaint.description: Large potholes on main road causing traffic issues and vehicle damage.

streetlightComplaint.title: Street Light Not Working
streetlightComplaint.description: Street lights are not working for the past week, causing safety concerns.
